markdownRemark.html: The goal of the design is to show the quality of the bar. The UI is designed to be simple so users can navigate through the website easily. A serif font was chosen for this project as it gives the design a premium look. The menu section is designed into two parts so the users can easily navigate between the items. It also has CTA so users can go to the actual menu.

frontmatter.title: The Library Bar
frontmatter.author: Prabhi
frontmatter.description: The library bar is a fictional restaurant that provides you with the best drinks and cuisines. The site works as an online platform for users to order dishes online. Users also get to know about the latest events the bar is hosting.
